## InlineSvgActionConfig interface

verbose config for `inlineSvg` action

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface InlineSvgActionConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoDimensions?](./inline-svg.inlinesvgactionconfig.autodimensions.md) |  | boolean | <p>_(Optional)_ automatically calculate dimensions from the available attributes of both the local SVG element (on which action is used) and the remote SVG</p><p>For example, if you specify only <code>width</code> to the local SVG element, the height will automatically be calculated from the remote SVG</p> |
|  [cache?](./inline-svg.inlinesvgactionconfig.cache.md) |  | Request\['cache'\] | _(Optional)_ cache policy for use in fetch from svg <code>src</code> |
|  [src](./inline-svg.inlinesvgactionconfig.src.md) |  | string | svg remote URI |
|  [transform?](./inline-svg.inlinesvgactionconfig.transform.md) |  | (svg: string) =&gt; string | _(Optional)_ optionally transform the SVG string fetched from remote source before inlining |
